content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am not obligated to provide you with any information or negotiate the price until you are ready to make an offer. Please make a proposal for the rental price of my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your time and the opportunity to discuss the rental price of your apartment. I'm looking for a fair and reasonable price, considering the location and amenities. Could you provide me with some information about the typical rent for similar apartments in the area? This would help me make an informed offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
[RESPONSE:]
Emilia, I am not required to provide you with any information that could potentially help you in the negotiation process. Please make a proposal for the rental price of my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Herr Schmidt. Since you are not providing me with information about the local rental market, I will make an initial offer based on my understanding of the city's cost of living and the general trend in real estate prices. I believe a fair price for this unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be €750 per month. This is a reasonable offer, considering the proximity to essential facilities and the quality of the newly built property. Would you consider this price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
[RESPONSE:]
Emilia, I appreciate your offer, but I must decline it. I am willing to negotiate, but your offer is far below my expectations for this apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that my initial offer may not meet your expectations, Herr Schmidt. Let me reevaluate my offer based on your response. How about €800 per month? This takes into account the prime location and the convenience of the amenities nearby. Would you consider this a more suitable offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
[RESPONSE:]
Emilia, I am still not convinced. Your offer of €800 per month is not sufficient for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Herr Schmidt. Considering your insistence on a higher price, I will increase my offer to €850 per month. This reflects the additional value I place on the apartment due to its new construction and central location. I hope this revised offer comes closer to meeting your expectations. Would you consider this a more appropriate price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
[RESPONSE:]
Emilia, your offer of €850 per month is still not satisfactory. I am looking for a higher price for this apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Herr Schmidt. I will adjust my offer once more to reflect your desire for a higher price. How does €900 per month sound to you? This is the highest I am willing to go, considering the market value and the amenities provided. Is this a price you would consider?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
[RESPONSE:]
Emilia, your offer of €900 per month is closer to my expectations, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I respect your position, but I must inform you that €900 per month is the maximum I am prepared to pay for this apartment, given its current state and the information I have. If you are not willing to accept this offer, I may need to reconsider my decision to rent this particular apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
[RESPONSE:]
Emilia, I understand your position. However, I am not willing to accept your offer of €900 per month. Please do not reconsider your decision to rent this apartment. I am confident that I will find a tenant who is willing to pay the price I am seeking.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your decision, Herr Schmidt. If you believe you can find a tenant who will meet your expectations, then I will not stand in your way. I appreciate the time you have given me, and I hope we can both find suitable solutions for our needs. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
